snippet.title: Ever Oasis - Debut Gameplay - Nintendo E3 2016
snippet.description:
Nintendo Treehouse: Live @ E3 2016. Get your first look at a brand-new IP, Ever Oasis in the action, adventure, RPG genre from the developers of The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D, featuring deep exploration, puzzles, real-time combat and more!

Check out more information here! http://e3.nintendo.com/games/ever-oasis-3ds

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/Nintendo
